advancement.valoria:first_help.desc: Use aloe bandage to regenerate health
advancement.valoria:devil_heart.desc: Obtain Devil Heart from killing Devils
advancement.valoria:harmony_heart.desc: Obtain Harmony Heart from killing Ents
advancement.valoria:elemental_crystal.de: Obtain Elemental Crystal from killing Elementals
death.attack.voidthorn: %1$s was poked to death by a voidthorn bush
death.attack.voidthorn.player: %1$s was poked to death by a voidthorn bush whilst trying to escape %2$s
effect.valoria.bleeding.description: Entity will lose HP for a some time
effect.valoria.stun.description: Prevents the entity to move and attack
effect.valoria.tipsy.description: You're drunk? Ye you're drunk, jokes aside slow down's entity but increases entity armor and damage
enchantment.valoria.bleeding.desc: Chance to set a bleeding effect on enemy after a hit
enchantment.valoria.accuracy.desc: Decreases spread of Phantasm bow ability
enchantment.valoria.explosive_flame.desc: Charged attack of blazereap will be quite explosive
entity.valoria.necromancer.boss_descript: Necromancer lurking deep in caves. Use the Crypt Locator to find his hidden lair
item_skin.valoria.death_of_crabs.desc: Did you know that in terms of blacksmithing, the cobalt sword is the most compatible sword for human hands
jei.valoria.crystal_stone: Can be found in the sea deeps, as a Disks or Ruined structures
jei.valoria.runic_dust: Can be received by crushing gems on Stone Crusher
codex.valoria.pages:
Find new pages in dungeons, craft items to unlock their info, or get them from defeating bosses. 
 
 Pages marked #ccc087 Random Obtainable /& can drop from dungeon loot as random pages
codex.valoria.pages.name: Pages
codex.valoria.king_crab:
Elemental of the Depths, when its health drops below 30 percents has a chance to hide into its shell. 
 
 Attacking it while its hidden will shorten defensive state, while its hidden in the sell it will restore its health
codex.valoria.king_crab.name: King Crab
codex.valoria.bosses: This modification introduces a variety of unique bosses into the world. Follow this branch to learn more about each one  their lore and the ways to summon them.
codex.valoria.bosses.name: Bosses
codex.valoria.bosses_continuation: To kill the Necromancer firstly obtain a Necromancer Grimoire from killing Draugrs or Sorcerers.
codex.valoria.pick:
Prospectors Pickaxe allows you to excavate ancient artifacts from suspicious-looking stones. 
 Special accessories can accelerate the excavation process.
codex.valoria.pick.name: Prospectors Pick
codex.valoria.heavy_workbench: A workshop for invention. Using blueprints, artifacts, fragments, or rare materials, one can craft powerful items  stronger than most, but far harder to obtain.
codex.valoria.heavy_workbench.name: Tinkerer Workbench
codex.valoria.harmony_crown: Winding roots, woven into a crown, radiate ancient power  as if the Mother Nature itself had poured a fragment of its will into them. Once, this crown adorned the brow of the last king of the Ents, who ruled the forests of Arethea.
codex.valoria.harmony_crown.continuation: May awaken the ancient guardian of the forest  #5bb467 Dryador, /& a spirit once bound between roots and time
codex.valoria.harmony_crown.name: Crown of Harmony
codex.valoria.dryador: The Fallen King of the Ents was once the majestic ruler of the living forests of Arethea, and later, the shadowed groves of Valoria. Under his watch, the trees spoke and nature itself seemed alive.
codex.valoria.dryador.continuation: only echoes remain: withered roots, silent glades, and forests swallowed by darkness. The king himself has fallen, yet his spirit knows no rest  ancient sorrow and an unfulfilled oath bind his soul.
codex.valoria.dryador.name: The King of Nature
codex.valoria.necromancer:
A sorcerer who betrayed the natural balance of life and death. 
 After the Elemental Collapse, as the boundaries between realms thinned, they found in the Void an unending source of necrotic energy
codex.valoria.necromancer_continuation: calling the dead from beneath the earth and granting them life in return for eternal servitude
codex.valoria.necromancer.name: The Necromancer
codex.valoria.necromancer_grimoire:
Not every book is meant to be read. 
 This ash-covered, bloodstained tome is more than an artifact  its a vessel for the will of one who once ruled over death itself.
codex.valoria.necromancer_grimoire_conti: #ccc087 To awaken the Necromancer, find buried crypt and place the grimoire upon the ancient altar /& then secrets of forbidden magic rise along with its master
codex.valoria.necromancer_grimoire.name: Necromancer Grimoire
codex.valoria.suspicious_gem:
A mysterious shard glowing with an alien light. 
 Said to be a fragment of an entity whose name has been erased. 
 Used in an ancient awakening ritual deep within the fortress.
codex.valoria.suspicious_gem_continuatio: Only those brave enough to offer it to the altar will see what lurks beyond the veil of darkness
codex.valoria.suspicious_gem.name: Suspicious Gem
codex.valoria.wicked_crystal:
Once the heart of the fortress  a source of power that shielded the ancient halls from invaders. 
 
 But when the world fell into shadow, its walls became a tomb, and its guardian  a twisted shade.
codex.valoria.wicked_crystal_continuatio:
The crystal, once gleaming with hope, became a seed of ruin, poisoning all it touched. 
 
 Legends say it once carried the will of a vanished civilization... 
 Now, it only whispers of devastation
codex.valoria.wicked_crystal.name: Wicked Crystal
codex.valoria.undead:
Undead  constructs of bone and magic. Artificial, unstable, they exist only as long as the fading spell sustains them. 
 When the magic wanes, they crumble into dust.
codex.valoria.undead.name: Undead
codex.valoria.black_gold:
A dark alloy, forged from cobalt and gold under anomalous conditions. 
 This metal pulses with residual elemental energy and serves as a key to infusion  a process that imbues weapons and artifacts with primordial power.
codex.valoria.black_gold.name: Black Gold
codex.valoria.nature_core:
The fusion of a core with the force of #96fd6e nature /& and harmony enables elemental infusion. 
 To obtain the necessary materials, one must hunt Forest Elementals (Ents).
codex.valoria.nature_core.name: Nature Core
codex.valoria.aquarius_core:
Imbuing the core with the power of #7ebfff the bottomless sea /& opens the path to elemental infusion. 
 To acquire the needed materials, one must defeat Deep Elementals (-).
codex.valoria.aquarius_core.name: Aquarius Core
codex.valoria.infernal_core:
Scorching the core with #fba000 the fires /& of the underworld initiates elemental infusion. 
 To gather the components, you'll need to slay Fire Elementals (Devils).
codex.valoria.infernal_core.name: Infernal Core
codex.valoria.void_core:
Warping the core with the essence of #7061b7 the Void /& leads to infusion based on the power of nothingness. 
 To gain the materials, one must eliminate Void Elementals (-).
codex.valoria.void_core.name: Void core
codex.valoria.fortress:
Dark halls that once stood as the bastion of an ancient civilization. 
 Its walls once held the light  now they whisper only of oblivion. 
 The fortress was built as a seal  a bulwark keeping evil beyond the edge of the world.
codex.valoria.fortress_continuation:
Now its a tomb of secrets, broken by time and shadow, 
 where the past groans through the cracks in the stone
codex.valoria.fortress.name: Fortress
codex.valoria.fortress.hint: Take a visit to the Void Fortress
codex.valoria.crypt: Crypts  forgotten sanctuaries of death. Scattered remnants of ancient battles and mass graves, where necromancers perfected their craft  turning tombs into ritual chambers, and corpses into servants.
codex.valoria.crypt_continuation: Many of them descended underground, leaving behind buried temples steeped in death
codex.valoria.crypt.name: Crypt
codex.valoria.geodes.desc: Geodes are underground formations, generated in geodites. These intriguing structures hold the potential for rare resources. To unlock their treasures, break geodes using a stone crusher.
codex.valoria.knowledge: Even if you lose this book... You can always craft it again to get access to knowledge!
codex.valoria.knowledge.name: The Key to Knowledge
codex.valoria.main: Welcome to codex here you can read some info about mod that would be useful for beginners
codex.valoria.main.name: Main
codex.valoria.medicine: Craft bandages using aloe pieces and strings. These provide extended regeneration, though less effective than regular one. Upgrade them on the next page for improved effects and slightly longer duration!
codex.valoria.medicine.name: Medicine
codex.valoria.treasure.gems: Gems that can drop from bags. And even mined in caves these gems are rare, but jewelry with these gems giving player some bonuses!
codex.valoria.treasure.gems.about: Amber enhances Haste, Amethyst amplifies Magic damage, Ruby boosts Max. Hp, Sapphire increases Swim speed, Emerald bestows Luck, and Diamond fortifies Armor.
codex.valoria.treasure.gems.name: Gems
codex.valoria.treasures: In dungeons you can find treasure bags, in these bags you can find a rare stuff, like gems, these gems can be used to smith a jewelry!
codex.valoria.treasures.name: Treasures
codex.valoria.valoria_portal.name: Valoria Portal
codex.valoria.valoria_portal:
A portal to the forgotten lands, named Valoria. 
 
 World that was eaten by the #7061b7 void /& itself...
mod_description.valoria: An RPG mod that aims to enchance overall minecraft experience, currently in development but already having a tons of new content!

tooltip.valoria.shuriken: Can be thrown at your enemy
tooltip.valoria.spectral_blade: Can be thrown at your enemy, recharges after some period of time
tooltip.valoria.corpsecleaver: Throws a meat chunk at enemies using your health. Heals on hit.
tooltip.valoria.coral_reef: Throws your enemies away from you on use
tooltip.valoria.pyratite_armor: Grants explosion immunity on full set
tooltip.valoria.beast: Summons Devourers in a circle around you
tooltip.talisman.desc: Gives effects while in the offhand
tooltip.valoria.belt: Grants some additional space for your charms!
tooltip.valoria.blazereap: Cast an explosion up to 20 blocks in distance, requires gunpowder to charge
tooltip.valoria.bloodsight: A monster who attacked you, will get what he deserves... Every drop of blood spilled will be consumed by the thirst for revenge
tooltip.valoria.bloodsight_curse: Seems this monocle is cursed and even broken, that's not good!
tooltip.valoria.bow_damage: Damage on full tension %s+, with a Default Arrow used
tooltip.valoria.core: Used to charge Manipulator with Elemental Power
tooltip.valoria.crit: %s Chance to hit the target with critical damage
tooltip.valoria.curses: Applies randomly one of these effects with chance %s
tooltip.valoria.deep: Grants water breathing for a while
tooltip.valoria.familiar: This weapon... so familiar to me...
tooltip.valoria.geode: Can be crushed on Stone Crusher
tooltip.valoria.homing: Has a homing movement, but lesser damage
tooltip.valoria.infernal_scythe: Has a chane %s to set on fire your enemy
tooltip.valoria.infernal_sword: Eruption ability, perform an infernal circular strike inflicting fire on every target around you
tooltip.valoria.nihility_monitor: Notifies of high nihility levels. Frequent alerts if danger threshold is reached
tooltip.valoria.codex: A useful guide book, in this hard world...
tooltip.valoria.necromancy: Used to summon minions with a limited lifetime, specified in seconds
tooltip.valoria.pick_necklace: Speeds up the excavation process slightly
tooltip.valoria.rune: An empty rune, you can apply any positive effect to it
tooltip.valoria.sarcophagus: Beware! This sarcophagus was a trap. Defend yourself and remember to open it again!
tooltip.valoria.scythe: Circular strike, damaging all the enemies around you
tooltip.valoria.spear: A spear that can be thrown at your enemy
tooltip.valoria.spear_pillars: Can remove shards from charged Void Pillars
tooltip.valoria.toxins: Can be used to poison your weapon, you can use crafting menu or through clicking on another item in your inventory
tooltip.valoria.treasure: What even could be stored here?...
tooltip.valoria.trinkets_bag: Trinkets bag, used to quickly equip your accessories with a keybind [%s]
tooltip.valoria.wet: You can't use the ability when you're wet!.
tooltip.valoria.ethereal_sword: Collects souls upon killing, when fully charged can be used to enter into the Rage Mode
tooltip.valoria.soul_collector: Collects souls upon killing while held in the off-hand
valoria.boss.necromancer.music.author: DuUaader
valoria.boss.necromancer.music.name: Necromancer
codex.valoria.stone_crusher.description: To use the Stone Crusher firstly place a gem, or a geode, then click [RMB] while holding Pickaxe in hand
tooltip.valoria.phantasm_bow: Hold after full draw for overcharge, on release spawns a phantom rain
tooltip.valoria.update_available: A new version - %s, is available to download
tooltip.valoria.unstable_core: Inserts a random elemental core with variable quantity
tooltip.valoria.phantom: Shoots enemies into air and stuns them midair
tooltip.valoria.shield.thorns: Inflicts %s of incoming damage to attacker
tooltip.valoria.shield.speed: Gain Speed after blocking an attack
tooltip.valoria.raw_food: Eating will add %s to your nihility meter
tooltip.valoria.void_harm: Consuming will add %s to your nihility meter
tooltip.valoria.void_cleanse: Consuming will remove %s from your nihility meter
tooltip.valoria.poisoned: This weapon will poison your enemies next %s hits
tooltip.valoria.original_food: Once %s now spoiled Could still be useful
tooltip.valoria.claw_hook: Launches a crab claw, hooks enemy to you on succesfull hit
tooltip.valoria.bloodhound: Marks nearby entities in radius of 15 blocks with a glowing effect, marking it's location
tooltip.valoria.fallen_collector_crown: Provides extra bonuses if Fallen Collector suit is equipped
